constraints.name: area_bound
constraints.description: 任意三点构成的三角形面积不超过 S
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j, k ∈ [1, n], area(p_i, p_j, p_k) ≤ S

constraints.name: enclosing_triangle_area_bound
constraints.description: 包含所有点的三角形面积不超过 4S
constraints.formal: ∃ triangle T, ∀ points p_i, p_i ∈ T and area(T) ≤ 4S

constraints.name: no_collinear_points
constraints.description: 至少存在一个三元组，其三点不共线
constraints.formal: ∃ i, j, k ∈ [1, n], points p_i, p_j, p_k are not collinear
